name: Get And Sacrifice
description:
"Hard game"

    ~ everyone that playtested the game

Only 0.01% of people can reach level 5

*EKHM* Seriously, a little "roguelike-like" game but without roguelike core mechanics (lmao) made in 7 days for Spooktober Game Jam 2021. You play as a smiley face beating up monsters. Before each wave you can tweak your stats to fit better for the next one. ALMOST everything is made by me from scratch. Hope you enjoy ^-^
